channel.title: Paying For Webclient - All Info Here
channel.description:
You don't need to read this story if you don't want to, I recommend it but if you want, skip down to the bottom for a summary.
I am in need of a webclient. I'm not really a noob, I'm just really lazy. I tried configuring my client to download the cache and run from it for about 3 hours now, and I'm not wasting any more of my time on it. I really need one.
I'm the owner of ForeverPkers which was a pretty big (100+ players) game, and I'm starting from scratch using a Project Insanity source. The client has Chaotic weapons and all that jazz, so I can't just use the default Project Insanity webclient.
The download for my client is on my website, [url=http://www.ForeverPkers.com/download.zip]http://www.ForeverPkers.com/download.zip[/url] I'd tell you the IP and port, but I don't want you to go and make a new webclient from an existing one, I want it made from my client.
I'd like the cache to be in C:/ForeverPkers_cache.
I'll pay you with PayPal, and I'm offering 10$ for the work.
My MSN is [email]ForeverPkers@live.com[/email].
Check my website ForeverPkers.com and here's a pic of my old success, to show you can trust me sending you money >.> There are a lot of scammers here.
[IMG]http://www.Foreverpkers.com/foreverpkers.png[/img]
Summary:
Client: [url=http://www.foreverpkers.com/download.zip]http://www.foreverpkers.com/download.zip[/url] Java Files for Client: [url=http://www.foreverpkers.com/files.zip]http://www.foreverpkers.com/files.zip[/url] Where I want the cache: C:/ForeverPkers_cache Port and IP are in my client, I want it made from that. My MSN for contact: [email]ForeverPkers@live.com[/email] Payment: 10$ PayPal, please refer to above Files I am requesting: client.jar (after you jar the webclient, so I can test it), cache.zip (With MY cache in it), Client Files in a folder and open source. I'd also appreciate if you would first CONNECT to my game and make sure everything looks good with your .jar, so it's not all null items like my attempt.
Thank you, thank you, thank you for whoever can do this for me.

item.title: Paying For Webclient - All Info Here
item.dc:creator: @fpkers fpkers
item.description:
@fpkers wrote:

You don’t need to read this story if you don’t want to, I recommend it but if you want, skip down to the bottom for a summary.

I am in need of a webclient. I’m not really a noob, I’m just really lazy. I tried configuring my client to download the cache and run from it for about 3 hours now, and I’m not wasting any more of my time on it. I really need one.

I’m the owner of ForeverPkers which was a pretty big (100+ players) game, and I’m starting from scratch using a Project Insanity source. The client has Chaotic weapons and all that jazz, so I can’t just use the default Project Insanity webclient.

The download for my client is on my website,
http://www.ForeverPkers.com/download.zip
I’d tell you the IP and port, but I don’t want you to go and make a new webclient from an existing one, I want it made from my client.

I’d like the cache to be in C:/ForeverPkers_cache.

I’ll pay you with PayPal, and I’m offering 10$ for the work.

My MSN is ForeverPkers@live.com.

Check my website ForeverPkers.com and here’s a pic of my old success, to show you can trust me sending you money >.> There are a lot of scammers here.

Summary:

Client: http://www.foreverpkers.com/download.zip
Java Files for Client: http://www.foreverpkers.com/files.zip
Where I want the cache: C:/ForeverPkers_cache
Port and IP are in my client, I want it made from that.
My MSN for contact: ForeverPkers@live.com
Payment: 10$ PayPal, please refer to above
Files I am requesting: client.jar (after you jar the webclient, so I can test it), cache.zip (With MY cache in it), Client Files in a folder and open source.
I’d also appreciate if you would first CONNECT to my game and make sure everything looks good with your .jar, so it’s not all null items like my attempt.

Thank you, thank you, thank you for whoever can do this for me.
